name: 7PHP
description: If you are a fan of 7PHP, send them an email and receive some free stickers!

name: Accord Project
description: Contribute to their participating repositories, get swag in the form of t-shirts and stickers. You'll also be mentioned in a dedicated blog post in November.

name: Alexa
description: Publish a skill, get a t-shirt and an Echo Spot (if 50 customers per month use your Display skill for the first three months after publication)! Earn a 2-pack of Echo Buttons if you publish a Gadgets skill!

name: Alligator.io
description: Write a blog post on frontend development topics, get some cool Alligator stickers!

name: Aras
description: Submit an improvement to any Aras Community Project in October 2018 to earn stickers! Submit five, earn a limited edition T-shirt!

name: Auth0
description: Have one accepted pull request in a qualifying Auth0 Github project in October 2018 and receive a kickass 2018 Hacktoberfest t-shirt courtesy of the awesome Auth0 team, along with a psychedelic Auth0 sticker pack!

name: CircleCI
description: Participate in #Orbtoberfest with CircleCI and claim limited edition swag! 1 - 3 pull requests: Limited-Edition Sticker, 4+ pull requests: Limited-Edition T-shirt

name: Codeship
description: Submit 15 builds in 30 days, get stickers sent your way! (Ships only to North America and Europe)

name: Contentful
description: Sign up to Contentful and get a free pair of socks to your door.

name: devRant
description: Get 30 ++'s on a single rant you've posted to devRant to receive 3 free high-quality devRant laptop stickers! Or post an awesome rant that gets over 750 ++'s to receive a free devRant squishy stress ball!

name: Digital Ocean
description: Make five pull requests in October, earn a limited edition T-shirt!

name: Gatsby
description: Get a pull request merged into Gatsby and receive a free shirt, socks, or stickers.

name: Google Assistant
description: Make an app for the Google Assistant available to users, get an exclusive Google Assistant t-shirt and a Google Home (if a certain number of users engage with it)!

name: Hacktoberfest 2019
description: To qualify for the official limited edition Hacktoberfest T-shirt, you must register and then make four pull requests (PRs) between October 1-31 (in any time zone).

name: Hasura
description: Submit a PR to Hasura's GraphQL Engine repo in October 2018 and get a Hasura sticker pack. If your PR to an issue tagged as 'hacktoberfest' gets merged, you also get a Hasura t-shirt!

name: IPFS
description: Contact the IPFS team via e-mail, and ask them kindly for some swag!

name: Jetbrains
description: Fill in the form and get stickers of Jetbrains products for your whole usergroup, event or company. It's free of charge and sent anywere in the world.

name: JS Bin
description: Fill out a Google form with your name and address and get a sticker. Thereâ€™s no cost to you, but they will be restricting the send outs to bi-monthly or quaterly depending on demand.

name: Kong
description: Everyone who gets 1 PR accepted to a Kong repo can get a Kong Contributor T-shirt!

name: LBRY
description: Anyone who makes any contribution at all, even a one line typo fix, will receive a LBRY sticker. Anyone who contributes anything of any substance will receive a sticker, LBRY t-shirt, and more.

name: Magento
description: Have 5 merged PRs or validate at least 10 issues in October 2018, get a Squashtoberfest T-Shirt!

name: Microsoft
description: Make one pull request in October 2018 to any open source Microsoft repository, earn a limited edition T-shirt!

name: NativeScript
description: Make your first contribution to the NativeScript community and win an awesome set of stickers. Among the stickers you will find a limited edition 'Contributor' sticker.

name: Netlify
description: Complete this survey about using Netlify for documentation and get stickers.

name: Nexmo
description: Have one accepted pull request in October 2018 to any Nexmo Repository, earn a limited edition #nextoberfest T-shirt!

name: npm
description: Fix a bug, get a fashionable pair of socks!

name: OpenBazaar
description: Help improve our code and earn a limited edition shirt.

name: OpenEBS
description: Have one accepted pull request in an OpenEBS repository during October 2018 to earn an OpenEBS t-shirt and stickers. The best PR will also receive a laptop.

name: Operation Code
description: Close 3 issues, get a t-shirt. Make a PR and get stickers.

name: opsdroid
description: Contribute to opsdroid and receive some stickers!

name: Passenger
description: Register to join the November 1st livestream in which Phusion adds a major feature to Passenger, and win a custom key cap or beanie with the Passenger logo embroided (and stickers, guaranteed).

name: SAP
description: Submit a valid PR to an ABAP Project

name: SendGrid
description: Five accepted pull results from SendGrid will qualify you for a special edition SendGrid Hacktoberfest T-shirt.

name: SimbaChain
description: Register and get a free Blockchain Shirt! Pick your side, eth_listtransactions = _yep vs eth_listtransactions = _nope. Ships only to USA.

name: source{d}
description: Three merged pull requests in any source{d} repo to receive a limited edition T-shirt as well as one sticker for those who get at least one pull requests merged.

name: Twilio
description: Complete the first set of objectives in Twilio Quest and get a Twilio Quest t-shirt right to your door.

name: Twilio
description: A collection of stickers and a special pair of Twilio socks are up for grabs when you contribute to any project on github.com/twilio-labs (including the Open Pixel Art project).

name: Umbraco
description: Have one accepted pull request in a Umbraco repository during October 2018 to get some super exclusive Umbraco swag. All the contributors will also be listed by Github username in a dedicated blog post in November.

name: Umbraco
description: Have one approved PR on any Umbraco repo to get some exclusive and limited Umbraco swag. All contributors will also be listed by Github username in their November blog post!

name: Valor Software
description: Make pull requests to issues tagged with "Hacktoberfest" label in ngx-bootstrap repo during October and get a pen, a sticker, a notepad, and a wooden phone stand.

name: WhatIsMyBrowser
description: Send an API request, get some sweet vinyl laptop stickers!
